foundationPage.missionStatementText: Mraksoll, 30 years old, is a programmer who loves blockchain technology very much. He has more than 7 years of experience in blockchain development and is familiar with various computer languages. He has participated in many blockchain projects and is the core developer in the Bitweb project. In the future, he will make a great contribution to the establishment of DEFI, Lightning Network and other ecosystems.
foundationPage.missionStatementText1: Jcchain, 23 years old, is a programmer who loves block chain technology. With 4 years of development experience, he is familiar with JS, C++, HTML, Vue, PHP and other computer languages. He has participated in many projects in other fields,He was more of a minor developer on the Bitweb project.
foundationPage.missionStatementText2: 雪莲 - Xuelian is a community manager who joined our team from the BTE community. Her primary responsibility is to drive the growth and engagement of our community by providing support and assistance to its members. She strongly believes in the development of BTE and works tirelessly to help it progress. In addition to her community management duties, Xuelian is actively involved in promoting BTE and its initiatives.
foundationPage.technicalSupportText: If you want to participate in the Bitweb, or if you want to support developers, there are several options available. If you are interested in becoming a developer on the Bitweb project, please send an email to contact@bitwebcore.net. If you would like to donate BTE to Bitweb to support the development of the project, simply send your BTE donation to the address below. If your BTE donation is greater than 100,000, you can choose to list your contribution among the partners. Please email us. If you would like to become a BTE partner or investor, please email us at contact@bitwebcore.net.

resourcesPage.exchangesText: DISCLAIMER: Before bitweb listing, don’t trust anyone, if you lose BTE, we will not take any responsibility.

walletPage.title: Wallets
walletPage.description: Send, receive, and store bitweb. The desktop wallet also enables minting blocks and securing of the network.

indexPage.title: New Peer-to-Peer Electronic Cash System
indexPage.description: The world's leading payment network, secure and efficient cryptocurrency.
indexPage.efficientEnergyText1: Bitweb is based on bitcoin and inherits all the characteristics of bitcoin system --- security, stability and efficiency.
indexPage.efficientEnergyText2: Bitweb's supply is limited, with a maximum supply of 96 million coins, unaffected by inflation.
indexPage.efficientEnergyText3: It supports legacy, p2sh segwit and bech32 addresses to protect privacy.
indexPage.userGovernanceText1: Bitweb has a maximum block size of 4m on average, just like Bitcoin, and is also secured by Segwit support.
indexPage.userGovernanceText2: Segwit saves space in the Bitweb block, and the 60 second block time ensures acceptable performance. It also contributes to lower transaction fees.
indexPage.userGovernanceText3: Bitweb's every block time is 60 seconds, so its transaction speed is very fast, 10 times that of bitcoin.
indexPage.trustlessText1: Bitweb uses yespower algorithm, which only supports CPU computing, reduces everyone's participation cost, and allows more people to participate and use BTE.
indexPage.trustlessText2: Energy consumption is lower, and miners can get rewards for participating in mining, with 50 BTE coins per block.
indexPage.trustlessText3: Bitweb uses LWMA difficulty adjustment to halve the production per 840000 blocks.
indexPage.fairDistributionText1: An effective cryptocurrency has a wide enough equitable distribution to ensure that all coin supply is not concentrated in the hands of very few people.
indexPage.fairDistributionText2: Bitweb is a P2P money system based on bitcoin. It inherits all the features of bitcoin and makes further improvement and Optimization on the basis of bitcoin. Bitweb is successful. We hope more people will participate in and use BTE.
indexPage.fairDistributionText3: To let more people know about Bitweb, we previously mined 12 million coins to build infrastructure.
indexPage.fairDistributionText4: We hope that Bitweb will become better and be used as a cryptocurrency to pay for various services.

collapsables.walletText1: The Bitweb wallet is available on Windows, Mac OSX, and Linux platforms.
collapsables.walletText3: To get started, check out the Wallet download page and the Installation guide's.
collapsables.mineText1: Bitweb uses the Yespower algorithm for proof-of-work mining. This means that anyone can exploit bitweb.
collapsables.communityText1: Join our Forum, Discord to chat with other bitweb community members and developers.
